mapper.select: /** MemberMapper.countByUserId */ SELECT COUNT(M.id) FROM MEMBER M WHERE M.userId = #{userId}
/** MemberMapper.countByPhone */ SELECT COUNT(M.id) FROM MEMBER M WHERE M.phone = #{phone}
/** MemberMapper.countByEmail */ SELECT COUNT(M.id) FROM MEMBER M WHERE M.email = #{email}
/** MemberMapper.getNextId */ SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(M.id) > 0 THEN MAX(M.id)+1 ELSE 1 END FROM MEMBER M
mapper.insert: /** MemberMapper.insertMember */ INSERT INTO MEMBER ( id, userId, password, name, birth, gender, phone, email, nation, postNumber, address, addressDetail, createMemberId, createDate, isActive, isTempPassword, isAdmin ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{userId}, #{password}, #{name}, #{birth}, #{gender}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{nation}, #{postNumber}, #{address}, #{addressDetail}, #{id}, now(), true, false, false )
